title: Zerg Writer - Novel Updates
tags: Charming Protagonist   Early Romance   Futuristic Setting   Interdimensional Travel   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Seme Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Writers
author: 夜听春雨
description:
Fang Qingci, a reclusive writer on the earth, once transmigrated and became a super rare male of the interstellar zerg race.

Well, what? There is no such thing as romance novels here? Let me show you the light!

So he regained his old profession and started to write a few drama filled novels.

The females shouted that such affectionate males could not exist, but they kept rewarding honestly.

As he wrote, Fang Qingci became a well-known great writer in the interstellar universe.

With a career, love is also essential.

The major general next door knelt down on his knees, offered all his wealth and a sincere heart, and only asked for the position of a servant.

Of course, I’ll take everything you have and stay with you forever!>
